features.title: Comprehensive Task Management
features.description: Create, assign, and track tasks with priority levels, deadlines, and dependencies. Easily manage personal and team tasks.

features.title: Multi-Organization Support
features.description: Manage multiple organizations and teams under one account. Flexible task management across different departments.

features.title: Flexible Dashboard
features.description: Intuitive 3-day rolling dashboard with drag-and-drop functionality. Switch between day and calendar views effortlessly.

features.title: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: Granular permission system with roles like Admin, Project Manager, Team Lead, and Member. Secure and controlled task access.

features.title: Collaborative Communication
features.description: In-task commenting with @mentions, rich text editing, file attachments, and comment threads for seamless team collaboration.

features.title: Team and Project Management
features.description: Create teams, assign leads, manage members, and oversee project progress with intuitive team management tools.
